trans-unit.source: OpenBVE is a free and open-source multi-platform train simulator, featuring support for 2D and 3D cabs and scenery.\r\n\r\nThis program was initially developed by Michelle, and is released into the public domain where legally possible.
OpenBVE makes use of several open-source libraries, whose licenses are reproduced below:

This function will create a zip archive on your Desktop, containing the previous Simulation log and Crash log (If any), along with a text file containing the brief description of the problem entered below.\r\n\r\nPlease post this on the discussion board, or create a new issue on Github.
Please enter a brief description of the problem:
The report has been saved as "[filename]" on your desktop. \r\n\r\nYou may now submit a bug report to the discussion board, or open an issue on GitHub with this zip file attached.
Cannot create bug report! \r\n\r\nYou may access the Log and Crash Log directly by clicking the "View..." button, then submit these logs to the discussion board or open an issue on GitHub.
A connection to the server could be established. Unfortunately, the version information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Sambungan ke pelayan dapat disambungkan. Malangnya, maklumat versi tidak dapat diambil semula.

trans-unit.source: You already have the latest version.
trans-unit.target: Anda sudah mempunyai versi yang terkini.

trans-unit.source: The most recent nightly build from [date] is available for download.
The new version [version] ([date]) is available for download on the Official Homepage.
trans-unit.target: Versi baharu [version] ([date]) sudah tersedia untuk dimuat turun dari Laman utama Rasmi OpenBVE.

trans-unit.source:
A critical error occured: 

 [error] 

 Please inspect the error log file for further information.
A critical error occured whilst parsing the [file] file
trans-unit.target: Ralat kritikal berlaku semasa menghuraikan fail [file]

trans-unit.source: The file system configuration could not be accessed or is invalid due to the following reason:
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasi sistem fail tidak dapat diakses atau tidak sah kerana sebab berikut:

trans-unit.source: An older key-configuration file was found.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasi kunci yang lama telah ditemui.

trans-unit.source: The current key-configuration has been reset to defaults.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasi kunci terkini telah disetkan semula kepada lalai.

trans-unit.source: The default key assingment file is an older version or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: Fail penetapan kunci lalai ialah versi lama atau telah rosak.

trans-unit.source: The default key assignment file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Fail penetapan kunci lalai tidak wujud.

trans-unit.source: You are currently running on the [platform] backend. Please use the in-game menu to configure any joystick based controls.
trans-unit.target: Anda sedang berjalan pada backend [platform]. Sila gunakan menu dalam permainan untuk mengkonfigurasi sebarang kawalan berasaskan joystick.

trans-unit.source: OpenAL 1.1 is required. You seem to have version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: OpenAL 1.1 diperlukan. Anda kelihatan mempunyai versi 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The OpenAL context could not be created.
The OpenAL sound device could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: Peranti bunyi OpenAL tidak dapat dibuka.

trans-unit.source: An error occured whilst attempting to switch to fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: Ralat telah berlaku apabila anda bertukar ke mod skrin penuh.

trans-unit.source: Please check your fullscreen resolution settings.
trans-unit.target: Sila semak tetapan resolusi mod skrin penuh.

trans-unit.source: Please first select a route file to begin.
trans-unit.target: Sila pilih fail laluan untuk mula.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n WithTrack section missing.
trans-unit.target: Laluan yang dipilih adalah rosak: \r\n dengan WithTrack hilang.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n No stations defined.
trans-unit.target: Laluan yang dipilih adalah rosak: \n\r Tiada stesen yang ditarifkan.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n No objects defined.
trans-unit.target: Laluan yang dipilih adalah rosak: \r\n Tiada objek yang ditakrifkan.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n Unable to locate all defined objects.
trans-unit.target: Laluan yang dipilih adalah rosak: \r\n Tidak dapat mencari kesemua objek yang ditakrifkan.

trans-unit.source: The train plugin [plugin] failed to load.
The built-in ATS/ ATC systems will be used instead, which may cause issues.
trans-unit.target: Sistem ATS/ATC yang terbina dalam akan digunakan. Sebaliknya, ia mungkin akan menimbulkan masalah

trans-unit.source: Attempted to create a package with an empty filename.
trans-unit.target: Telah mencuba untuk membuat pakej dengan tiada nama fail.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which you attempted to save the package file does not exist: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Direktori tempat anda cuba menyimpan fail pakej tidak wujud: \r \n

trans-unit.source: No write access available in the directory in which you attempted to save the package file: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Tiada akses menulis tersedia dalam direktori di mana anda mencuba untuk menyimpan fail pakej: \r \n

trans-unit.source: Failed to create the following file: \r \n
Please check that this path is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Sila semak bahawa laluan ini boleh diakses.

trans-unit.source: If you are attempting to install addons in the Program Files or ProgramData folders, this may require administrator permission. \r\n\r\n This is not recommended for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Jika anda cuba memasang add-on dalam folder Program Files atau ProgramData, ini mungkin memerlukan kebenaran pentadbir. \r\n\r\n Ini tidak disyorkan atas sebab keselamatan.

trans-unit.source: The .Turn command and the .Switch command may not be used in the same route.
Use the train suggested by the route
trans-unit.target: Guna kereta api yang disyorkan oleh laluan

trans-unit.source: The default train could not be found:\r\n\r\n
trans-unit.target: Kereta api asal tidak dapat dijumpai:\r\n\r\n

trans-unit.source: --- This train uses a safety system plugin which cannot be used on your operating system. The built-in safety systems ATS/ATC will be used instead, which might cause operational problems. ---
trans-unit.target: --- Kereta api ini menggunakan pemalam sistem keselamatan yang tidak boleh digunakan pada sistem pengendalian anda. Sebaliknya, sistem keselamatan terbina dalam ATS/ATC akan digunakan, yang mungkin menyebabkan masalah operasi. ---

trans-unit.source:
The default train is not currently installed:

 [train]

 It may be downloaded at:
These are shown in the list below:
trans-unit.target: Ini ditunjukkan dalam senarai di bawah:

trans-unit.source: Select the type of packages you wish to view:
trans-unit.target: Pilih jenis pakej yang anda ingin lihat:

trans-unit.source: This file does not appear to be a valid OpenBVE package.
trans-unit.target: Fail tidak kelihatan seperti pakej OpenBVE yang sah.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Pakej yang dipilih telah dipasang, dan ianya versi yang baharu.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is an older version.
trans-unit.target: Pakej yang dipilih telah dipasang, san ianya versi yang lama.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is an identical version.
trans-unit.target: Pakej yang dipilih telah dipasang dan merupakan versi yang sama.

trans-unit.source: A list of files installed is shown below:
trans-unit.target: Senarai fail yang telah dipasang ditunjukkan di bawah:

trans-unit.source: The current package has unmet dependancies.
trans-unit.target: Pakej terkini mempunyai tanggungan yang tidak terpenuhi.

trans-unit.source: The following dependancies may be broken by this action:
trans-unit.target: Tanggungan berikut mungkin rosak disebabkan oleh tindakan ini:

trans-unit.source: The following packages are recommended, but not installed:
trans-unit.target: Pakej berikut adalah disyorkan, tetapi tidak dipasangkan:

trans-unit.source: If your package does not rely on other dependencies, you may continue by clicking the "Create" button.
Package details and dependancies may be assigned in the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Butiran pakej dan tanggungan mungkin ditetapkan dalam langkah berikut.

trans-unit.source: The following files and folders will be packaged:
trans-unit.target: Fail dan folder berikut akan dibungkuskan:

trans-unit.source: The new package has been assigned the following GUID:
trans-unit.target: Pakej baharu telah diberikan GUID berikut:

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid package version number in the following format: \r\n 1.0.0
trans-unit.target: Sila masukkan nombor versi pakej yang sah dalam format berikut: \r\n 1.0.0

trans-unit.source: You have entered an invalid version number. \r\n Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah memasukkan nombor versi yang tidak sah. \r\n Sila cuba lagi.

trans-unit.source: The following files were added to your package:
trans-unit.target: Fail berikut akan ditambahkan ke pakej anda:

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, creation of your package failed.
trans-unit.target: Malangnya, penciptaan pakej anda telah gagal.

trans-unit.source: No files were selected to package- Please retry.
trans-unit.target: Tiada fail dipilih untuk dibungkus- Sila cuba semula.

trans-unit.source: The selected filename is invalid- Please retry.
trans-unit.target: Nama fail yang dipilih tidak sah- Sila cuba semula.

trans-unit.source: The new package has been assigned the following GUID:
trans-unit.target: Pakej baharu telah diberikan GUID berikut:

trans-unit.source: Replacing the package with the following GUID:
Is this to replace an existing package?
trans-unit.target: Adakah ini untuk menggantikan pakej sedia ada?

trans-unit.source: Please select the package you wish to replace:
trans-unit.target: Sili pilih pakej yang anda ingin ganti:
Tiada pakej yang telah dipasang sekarang ini.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, uninstallation of this package failed.
trans-unit.target: Malangnya, penyahpasangan pakej ini telah gagal.

trans-unit.source: Uninstallation of this package was successful.
Some existing packages may be broken by this action.
trans-unit.target: Sesetengah pakej sedia ada mungkin rosak oleh tindakan ini.

trans-unit.source: Unable to uninstall the selected package. \r\n XML file list missing.
trans-unit.target: Tidak dapat menyahpasang pakej yang dipilih. \r\n Senarai fail XML tiada.

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to remove this package from the database?
trans-unit.target: Adakah anda ingin mengalih keluar pakej ini daripada pangkalan data?

trans-unit.source: An error occured whilst saving the package database. \r\n Please check for write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Ralat berlaku semasa menyimpan pangkalan data pakej. \r\n Sila semak kebenaran menulis.

trans-unit.source: Please select the action you wish to take:
trans-unit.target: Sila pilih tindakan yang ingin ambil:

trans-unit.source: Attempted to create a package with an empty filename.
trans-unit.target: Telah mencuba untuk membuat pakej dengan tiada nama fail.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which you attempted to save the package file does not exist: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Direktori tempat anda cuba menyimpan fail pakej tidak wujud: \r \n

trans-unit.source: No write access available in the directory in which you attempted to save the package file: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Tiada akses menulis tersedia dalam direktori di mana anda mencuba untuk menyimpan fail pakej: \r \n

trans-unit.source: Failed to create the following file: \r \n
The package database version appears to be a newer version than supported by this copy of OpenBVE.
trans-unit.target: Versi pangkalan data pakej nampaknya merupakan versi yang lebih baharu daripada yang disokong oleh salinan OpenBVE ini.

trans-unit.source: The package database XML was invalid, and has been re-created.
trans-unit.target: Pangkalan data pakej XML tidak sah dan telah dibuat semula.

trans-unit.source: The package worker thread is currently busy. Please wait a moment and try again.
Reset the current control configuration to the defaults?

trans-unit.target: Perintah yang dipilih pada masa ini

trans-unit.source: Click here to enable keyboard grab to automatically select the desired key.
trans-unit.target: Klik di sini untuk membolehkan cengkaman papan kekunci memilih kekunci yang dikehendaki secara automatik.

trans-unit.source: Click here to enable joystick grab to automatically select the desired axis, button or hat.
trans-unit.target: Klik di sini untuk membolehkan joystick memilih paksi, butang atau topi yang dikehendaki secara automatik.

trans-unit.source: Press a button or move an axis or hat into the desired direction...
trans-unit.target: Tekan butang atau gerakkan paksi atau topi ke arah yang dikehendaki...

trans-unit.source: Move an axis into the direction of "increase" or "power"...
Move the reverser lever to the full reverse position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil pengundur ke kedudukan terbalik penuh dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the reverser lever to the full forward position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil pengundur ke kedudukan penuh ke hadapan dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the combined brake / throttle lever to the full power position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek / pendikit gabungan ke kedudukan kuasa penuh dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the combined brake / throttle lever to the full brake position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek / pendikit gabungan ke kedudukan brek penuh dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the dynamic brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek dinamik ke kedudukan pelepas dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the dynamic brake lever to the emergency position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek dinamik ke kedudukan kecemasan dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the independant brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek bebas ke kedudukan pelepas dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the independant brake lever to the full position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil brek bebas ke kedudukan penuh dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the bail-off lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan tuil bail-off ke kedudukan pelepasan dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move and hold the bail-off lever into the full position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Gerakkan dan tahan tuil bail-off ke dalam kedudukan penuh dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the wiper switch to OFF and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Alihkan suis pengelap ke OFF dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the wiper switch to FULL and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Alihkan suis pengelap ke PENUH dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.

trans-unit.source: Move the lights switch to OFF and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Alihkan suis lampu ke OFF dan tekan 'Next'.

trans-unit.source: Move the lights switch to FULL and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Alihkan suis lampu kepada PENUH dan tekan 'Seterusnya'.
Jadual waktu yang dijana secara automatik

trans-unit.source: Attempt to fix transparency issues in older content.
trans-unit.target: Cuba untuk membetulkan isu ketelusan dalam kandungan lama.

trans-unit.source: Enable hacks for buggy older content.
trans-unit.target: Dayakan pembetulan untuk kandungan lama yang bermasalah.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: If you enable Input Device Plugin(s), these may conflict with one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: AMARAN: Jika anda mendayakan Plugin(s) Peranti Input, ini mungkin bercanggah dengan satu atau lebih kawalan.

trans-unit.source:
Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train.

As some files could not be found, the route or train might not appear as intended. Try to redownload the route and train packages in order to ensure that you have a complete distribution.

The following list of issues might give additional information. You can still start the route by selecting "Ignore" from below.
trans-unit.target:
Beberapa isu telah dihadapi semasa memuatkan laluan dan kereta api.

Memandangkan sesetengah fail tidak ditemui, laluan atau kereta api mungkin tidak muncul seperti yang dimaksudkan. Cuba muat turun semula laluan dan pakej kereta api untuk memastikan anda mempunyai pengedaran yang lengkap.

Senarai isu berikut mungkin memberikan maklumat tambahan. Anda masih boleh memulakan laluan dengan memilih "Abaikan" dari bawah.

trans-unit.source: Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train. If you are the route or train developer, it might be worth taking a look at the following list of issues.\r\n\r\nAs a regular user, you can select "Ignore" at this point to start the game.
trans-unit.target: Beberapa isu telah dihadapi semasa memuatkan laluan dan kereta api. Jika anda adalah pembangun laluan atau kereta api, anda mungkin perlu melihat senarai isu berikut.\r\n\r\nSebagai pengguna biasa, anda boleh memilih "Abaikan" pada ketika ini untuk memulakan permainan.

trans-unit.source: You may proceed at [speed] [unit] with extreme caution.
trans-unit.target: Anda boleh meneruskan [speed][unit] dengan sangat berhati-hati.

trans-unit.source: You have passed a stop signal. Please apply the emergency brakes immediately and come to a complete hold.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah melepasi isyarat berhenti. Sila gunakan brek kecemasan dengan segera dan berhenti sepenuhnya.

trans-unit.source: The signal indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: Isyarat menunjukkan had laju sebanyak [limit] [unit] . Anda sedang melancong di [speed] [unit]. Tolong perlahankan kereta api.

trans-unit.source: The speed post indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: Post laju menunjukkan had laju sebanyak [limit] [unit]. Anda sedang melancong di [speed][unit]. Tolong perlahankan kereta api.

trans-unit.source: You have arrived at [name] and are [time] late.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah tiba di [name] dan [time] lewat.

trans-unit.source: You have arrived at [name] and are [time] early.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah tiba di [name] dan [time] awal.

trans-unit.source: Boarding complete. You may close the doors now.
trans-unit.target: Pengambilan penumpang selesai. Anda boleh menutup pintu sekarang.

trans-unit.source: You have passed [name] where you should have stopped.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah melepasi [name] di mana sepatutnya anda berhenti.

trans-unit.source: You have passed [name] while still boarding. Please come to a complete hold immediately.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah melepasi [name] semasa masih mengambil penumpang. Sila datang ke kedudukan berhenti yang betul dengan segera.

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available in Expert mode.
trans-unit.target: Ciri ini tidak tersedia dalam mod Pakar.

trans-unit.source: The AI might be unable to fully operate this train.
trans-unit.target: AI mungkin tidak dapat mengendalikan kereta api ini sepenuhnya.

trans-unit.source: Please switch to exterior view to uncouple.
Uncoupling the rear of car number
Uncoupling the front of car number
This coupler is fixed, and cannot uncouple.
Do you really want to exit to the main menu?
trans-unit.target: Adakah anda benar-benar mahu keluar ke menu utama?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to quit?
Please press any key or move a joystick axis to set this control...
trans-unit.target: Sila tekan sebarang kekunci atau gerakkan paksi joystick untuk menetapkan kawalan ini...

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to use the default train?
trans-unit.target: Adakah anda ingin menggunakan kereta api asal?

trans-unit.source: Increases power by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Meningkatkan kuasa dengan satu notch untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang

trans-unit.source: Decreases power by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Mengurangkan kuasa dengan satu notch untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang

trans-unit.source: Controls power for trains with two handles on half of a joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal kuasa untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang pada separuh paksi joystick

trans-unit.source: Controls power for trains with two handles on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal kuasa untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang pada paksi joystick penuh

trans-unit.source: Decreases brake by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Mengurangkan brek sebanyak satu notch untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang

trans-unit.source: Increases brake by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Meningkatkan brek sebanyak satu notch untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang

trans-unit.source: Decreases the locomotive brake by one notch
Increases the locomotive brake by one notch
Controls brake for trains with two handles on half of a joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal brek untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang pada separuh paksi joystick

trans-unit.source: Controls brake for trains with two handles on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal brek untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang pada paksi joystick penuh

trans-unit.source: Activates emergency brakes for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Aktifkan brek kecemasan untuk kereta api dua dengan pemegang

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward power by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Menggerakkan pemegang ke arah kuasa dengan satu notch untuk kereta api dengan satu pemegang

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward neutral by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Menggerakkan pemegang ke arah neutral dengan satu notch untuk kereta api dengan satu pemegang

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward brake by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Menggerakkan pemegang ke arah brek dengan satu notch untuk kereta api dengan satu pemegang

trans-unit.source: Activates emergency brake for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Aktifkan brek kecemasan untuk kereta api dengan dua pemegang

trans-unit.source: Controls power and brake for trains with one handle on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal kuasa dan brek untuk kereta api dengan satu pemegang pada paksi joystick penuh

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the power notch directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Laraskan notch kuasa terus daripada nilai pilihan arahan.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the brake notch directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Laraskan notch brek terus daripada nilai pilihan arahan.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the reverser directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Laraskan notch pengundur terus daripada nilai pilihan arahan.

trans-unit.source: Moves reverser forward by one notch
trans-unit.target: Menggerakkan pengundur ke hadapan dengan satu notch

trans-unit.source: Moves reverser backward by one notch
trans-unit.target: Menggerakkan pengundur ke belakang sebanyak satu notch

trans-unit.source: Controls reverser on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Mengawal pengundur pada paksi joystick penuh

trans-unit.source: Opens or closes the left doors
Opens or closes the right doors
Plays or stops the music horn
Activates or deactivates the constant speed device
trans-unit.target: Mengaktifkan atau menyahaktifkan peranti kelajuan malar

trans-unit.source: Activates or deactivates the system microphone soundsource
Activates or deactivates the security system on some trains
trans-unit.target: Mengaktifkan atau menyahaktifkan sistem keselamatan pada beberapa kereta api

trans-unit.source: The S function of the security system
The A1 function of the security system
The A2 function of the security system
The B1 function of the security system
The B2 function of the security system

The N function of the security system
The O function of the security system
The P function of the security system
Switches to the train's interior view
trans-unit.target: Beralih ke pandangan dalaman kereta api

trans-unit.source: Switches to the train's interior view. However, the panel is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Beralih ke pandangan dalaman kereta api. Walau bagaimanapun, panel tidak dipaparkan.

trans-unit.source: Switches to the train's exterior view
trans-unit.target: Beralih ke pandangan luar kereta api
Bertukar antara paparan fly-by yang berbeza
Memutar kamera ke arah lawan jam

trans-unit.source: Jumps to the previous point of interest in the route.
trans-unit.target: Melompat ke tempat menarik sebelum ini dalam laluan.

trans-unit.source: Jumps to the next point of interest in the route.
trans-unit.target: Melompat ke tempat menarik seterusnya ini dalam laluan.

trans-unit.source: Resets the camera view to default values
trans-unit.target: Menetapkan semula paparan kamera kepada nilai lalai

trans-unit.source: Activates or deactivates interior view camera restriction
trans-unit.target: Mengaktifkan atau menyahaktifkan sekatan kamera paparan dalaman
Togel melalui mod jadual waktu yang berbeza

Accessibility: Audibly announces the current speed.

Accessibility: Audibly announces the the next station name and distance.
Uncouples the front coupler for the selected car.
Uncouples the rear coupler for the selected car.

trans-unit.source: My controller is not detected or does not work properly
trans-unit.target: Pengawal saya tidak dikesan atau tidak berfungsi dengan betul

trans-unit.source: My controller is not working correctly
trans-unit.target: Pengawal saya tidak berfungsi dengan betul

trans-unit.source: My PS2 controller is not detected

If your non-USB controller is not providing correct input:

1. Ensure the USB adapter is working. Ideally, the adapter should map the direction buttons from a standard controller to separate buttons to avoid compatibility issues.
2. Calibrate the controller from the configuration window, if necessary.
trans-unit.target:
Jika pengawal bukan USB anda tidak memberikan input yang betul:
1. Pastikan penyesuai USB berfungsi. Sebaik-baiknya, penyesuai harus memetakan butang arah daripada pengawal standard untuk memisahkan butang untuk mengelakkan masalah keserasian. 2. Tentukur pengawal dari tetingkap konfigurasi, jika perlu.

trans-unit.source: If your PS2 controller does not appear in the list, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: Jika pengawal PS2 anda tidak muncul dalam senarai, ikuti langkah berikut:

trans-unit.source:
1. Extract the Windows drivers.
2. Download and run Zadig.
3. Load the appropriate CFG file for your device ("Device > Load Preset Device").
4. Press "Install Driver" and wait for installation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 1. Ekstrak driver Windows. 2. Muat turun dan jalankan Zadig. 3. Muatkan fail CFG yang sesuai untuk peranti anda ("Peranti > Muatkan Peranti Pratetap"). 4. Tekan "Install Driver" dan tunggu pemasangan selesai.

trans-unit.source: 1. Extract the Linux udev file.\r\n2. Copy the file to "/etc/udev/rules.d/" (root permissions required).\r\n3. Reboot or reload udev rules manually.
trans-unit.target: 1. Ekstrak fail udev Linux. 2. Salin fail ke "/etc/udev/rules.d/" (kebenaran root diperlukan). 3. But semula atau muat semula peraturan udev secara manual.

trans-unit.source:
LibUsb appears to be either missing, or has not been correctly symlinked for runtime loading.
Please follow the following instructions:

1. Check that the "libusb-1.0" package is installed.
2. Find the location of "libusb-1.0.so.0" - On recent Ubuntu and Debian versions, this is likely to be "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/"
3. Open the directory in the terminal.
4. Check this location to see if "libusb-1.0.so" exists.
5. If the file does not exist, we must create the appropriate symlink by executing the following command from this terminal: "sudo ln -s libusb-1.0.so.0 libusb-1.0.so"
trans-unit.target:
LibUsb nampaknya hilang atau tidak dipautkan dengan betul untuk pemuatan masa jalan. Sila ikut arahan berikut:
1. Semak bahawa pakej "libusb-1.0" telah dipasang. 2. Cari lokasi "libusb-1.0.so.0" - Pada versi Ubuntu dan Debian terkini, ini mungkin "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/" 3. Buka direktori dalam terminal. 4. Semak lokasi ini untuk melihat sama ada "libusb-1.0.so" wujud. 5. Jika fail tidak wujud, kita mesti mencipta symlink yang sesuai dengan melaksanakan arahan berikut dari terminal ini: "sudo ln -s libusb-1.0.so.0 libusb-1.0.so"

trans-unit.source: Electro-pneumatic air brake without brake pipe
trans-unit.target: Brek udara elektro-pneumatik tanpa paip brek

trans-unit.source: Air brake with partial release feature
trans-unit.target: Brek udara dengan ciri pelepasan separa

trans-unit.source: BrakeNotches must be at least 1 if HoldBrake is set.
trans-unit.target: BrakeNotches mestilah sekurang-kurangnya 1 jika HoldBrake ditetapkan.

trans-unit.source: DriverPowerNotches must be less than or equal to PowerNotches.
trans-unit.target: DriverPowerNotches mestilah kurang daripada atau sama dengan PowerNotches.

trans-unit.source: DriverBrakeNotches must be less than or equal to BrakeNotches.
trans-unit.target: DriverBrakeNotches mestilah kurang daripada atau sama dengan BrakeNotches.

trans-unit.source: DriverCar must be less than NumberOfMotorCars + NumberOfTrailerCars.
trans-unit.target: DriverCar must be less than JumlahMotorCars + JumlahTrailerCars.

trans-unit.source: NumberOfTrailerCars must be at least 1 if FrontCarIsAMotorCar is not set.
trans-unit.target: JumlahTrailesCars hendaklah sekurang kurangnya 1 jika KeretaDepanIalahMotorCar tidak disetkan.

trans-unit.source: Subtract deceleration due to air and rolling resistance
trans-unit.target: Kurangkan nyahpecutan kerana rintangan udara dan gelek
